mapper.insert: insert into ai_test_result (ai_user_id, ai_result_name, ai_result_describe, ai_result_lev, ai_result_time, ai_result_last_time, ai_result_total) values (#{aiUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiResultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiResultDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiResultLev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aiResultTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{aiResultLastTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{aiResultTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ai_user_id, ai_result_name, ai_result_describe, ai_result_lev, ai_result_time, ai_result_last_time, ai_result_total from ai_test_result
